snippet.title: Rise Eterna War || 15-minutes Gameplay
snippet.description:
Rise Eterna War is coming to Steam, GOG, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation, and Xbox on August 22nd!

Unleash your inner strategist and deck-building master in Rise Eterna War!

Witness the bloody tale of Arthbane, a valiant general fighting for his nation's liberation. 

Assemble your forces and command your troops to victory.

Add Rise Eterna War to your wishlist now:
⚫ https://store.steampowered.com/app/2739930/Rise_Eterna_War
🔴 https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/rise-eterna-war-switch/
🔵 https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10010806
🟢 https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/rise-eterna-war/9nxfzqzggh6x
---------------------------------
